channel.title: Utility on olaFlow | CFD for waves
channel.description: Recent content in Utility on olaFlow | CFD for waves

item.title: setOla: new utility added to olaFlow
item.description: The olaFlow CFD suite welcomes today a new utility: setOla. setOla works almost exactly like setFields, it helps you to set your initial conditions for VOF and velocity according to the wave conditions that you have defined as usual in the waveDict file. This utility can be very helpful when you want to save some time (the time that it takes for waves to propagate across the domain) and get the waves into your simulation straightaway.
